definition: to wrap (text)/line feed (computing)
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Trust newlines and indents to keep my code not only structured but running?
sentences.chinese: 讓我相信換行和縮進能保證代碼的結構和運行？

sentences.english: More specifically, it wraps widgets at the end of the row.
sentences.chinese: 更確切地講，它可使窗口小部件在行尾換行。

sentences.english: Q. What effect do tabs, spaces, and new lines have on the program?
sentences.chinese: 製表位，空格和換行符對程序有什麼影響？

sentences.english: The most common character entity in HTML is the non-breaking space.
sentences.chinese: 在HTML中最普通的實體字符就是不換行間隔了。

sentences.english: This is even more important when the data contain line breaks.
sentences.chinese: 當數據包含換行符時，這就更重要了。

sentences.english: A newline always matches the first rule.
sentences.chinese: 換行永遠都會匹配第一個規則。

sentences.english: You simply add a line break and description line to the unordered list.
sentences.chinese: 您只需向無序清單中添加一個換行符和描述行。

sentences.english: For each line, first extract all of the spaces and the line feed at the end of the line.
sentences.chinese: 對於每一行，首先解壓所有的空格和行末的換行符。

sentences.english: Now we have gotten rid of the newlines, so we need to convert to integers.
sentences.chinese: 現在，消除了換行之後，我們需要進行到整數的轉換。

sentences.english: Linefeed characters between East Asian characters are removed.
sentences.chinese: 移除東亞字符之間的換行符。

sentences.english: You pass in flags to create scroll bars and to tell the text to wrap.
sentences.chinese: 通過傳入標誌，創建滾動條，並告訴文本換行。

sentences.english: There we use a filter to remove the newlines.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏，我們使用了一個過濾器來消除換行。

sentences.english: There's a line feed there, and there might be some trailing spaces.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個換行，因此可能有一些尾隨的空格。

sentences.english: Because of this restriction, the data string must not contain any line breaks.
sentences.chinese: 因爲有這個限制，數據字符串必須不包含任何換行符。

sentences.english: Naturally more new-line, write some words.
sentences.chinese: 自然地多換行，多寫點句。

sentences.english: Unlike indent , it does not attempt to wrap long statements.
sentences.chinese: 不像縮進，它不對長語句進行自動換行。

definition: lit. view a text and interpret (idiom); to interpret word by word without understanding the meaning/a far-fetched interpretation
form of words (e.g. inflection, conjugation)/morphology (linguistics)
attributive (modifier)
word order
to define
falsetto/opposite: natural or true voice 真聲|真声[zhen1 sheng1]
nonsyllabic final r 儿 added to a word in spoken Chinese/also called retroflex final or r-ization
reckless/extremely daring
scholars tend to disparage one another (idiom)
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
lit. to use the eastern wind (idiom)/fig. to use sb's help
quotation mark (punct.)
confused/vague/indistinct/muddle-headed/mixed up/in a daze
to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
to have no other choice/to be the last resort
pinyin: bu4 de2 yi3 er2 wei2 zhi1

definition: superior judgment/sagacity
